Package simulation

Package that contains the items related with the simulation structure, i.e., the abstract class for the grid and our implementation of it, the Point class and the Edge.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISimulation
    Interface for the simulation to use, has the methods that must be defined to ensure the program works
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AGrid
    AGrid abstract class, contains all essential information about the grid used, as well as the methods needed to correctly use the program even if with a different implementation for the actual grid used, that will extend this class.
    Edge
    Edge class, contains the information and methods on the edges with a higher cost than the normal one.
    EvObservation
    Observation event class, used to do scheduled observations that print the required contentes observed.
    Grid
    Grid class, contains all essential information about the grid used, as well as the methods needed.
    Point
    Point, contains the coordinates of a given Point.
    Simulation
    Class for the simulation, implements the interface ISimulation.
    XML
    XML class, where the parsing of the XML file is done and the values needed are read from the file, while checking for errors in the input, either related to the way the file is written or with the permitted values.

Package simulation Description

Package that contains the items related with the simulation structure, i.e., the abstract class for the grid and our implementation of it, the Point class and the Edge. Also, an interface for the simulation class and the implementation used, making it possible to change both the grid and the simulation class. The Observation event is related to a simulation, therefore it is also present here, as well as the XML class, which is used to get the information needed from the XML file.
Author:
Miguel Rodrigues, nr 76176, Afonso Soares, nr 81086
